DOC.brief_summary: Investigators conducted a randomised perspective study to determine whether the use of HFJV instead of conventional mechanical ventilation will reduce the adverse cardiovascular effects of pneumoperitoneum during laparoscopic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of High Frequency Jet Ventilation (HFJV)During Laparoscopic Operations
DOC.criteria: Healthy patients, undergoing laparoscopic surgery for Symptomatic cholecystolithiasis. ASA 3 and 4
